title: Lamb and Beetroot Soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '450g diced lamb shoulder', '1 onion, peeled and finely chopped', '3.5 litres beef stock', '4 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '550g cabbage, cored and finely chopped', '675g ripe tomatoes, diced', '900g beetroots, peeled and diced (tops reserved)', '2 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '475ml soured cream', '4 tablespoons chopped dill']
